trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3AETHERPOT_00538_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Inscribed upon a metal plate are the words “Mark II crystal forge.” While the apparatus does not appear to be damaged, and it is clearly patterned after the forge in Pagos, its purpose and usage are not entirely clear...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3AETHERPOT_00538_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Inscribed upon a metal plate are the words “Mark II crystal forge.” The apparatus does not appear to be damaged, and it seems simple enough to use─presuming you have sufficient vitiated aether with which to fuel its operation...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3AETHERPOT_00538_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>It seems your Eurekan kettle lacks sufficient vitiated aether to produce even a single crystal...
